synopsis.text: Saionji Kaoru, Niwa Tetsuya, and Kazuki Endou are just a few of the many talented and beautiful boys who attend Bell Liberty Academy, an elite high school reserved for only the best of the best. So when average student Itou Keita receives a special invitation to attend, he can't help but wonder why. With no outstanding skills or talents to speak of, Keita finds himself surrounded by the privileged and the gifted, struggling to find his place among them. But as he navigates the social dynamics of his new school and catches the attention of the student body president and class secretary, Keita can't help but feel drawn to one boy in particular - the friendly and mysterious Kazuki Endou. As he tries to unravel the mystery behind his invitation, Keita will have to rely on his luck and his newfound friendships to find his place at Bell Liberty Academy. Will he be able to discover what makes him special, or will he forever remain an outsider among the elite? Only time will tell in this exciting and heartwarming anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
